title: Performance: the Linux buffer isn't released
content:
The Linux buffer on the control plane node or worker node isn't released during suite installation and operation even when the free memory is low.

Cause

The cause for this issue is unknown.

Solution

To resolve the issue, use the following commands to release the buffer manually:

echo 1 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
echo 2 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
sync
